techmeme.title: Matthew Lane, a 19-year-old from Massachusetts, pleads guilty to hacking two US companies and extorting them for ransoms; source: one of them is PowerSchool (Kevin Collier/NBC News)
The Argentine government dismantles a body created three months ago to investigate the Libra cryptocurrency scandal involving President Milei and his sister (Ignacio Olivera Doll/Bloomberg)
Sources: US chipmaker Wolfspeed is preparing to file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy within weeks after passing on debt-holder proposals to restructure its debt (Wall Street Journal)
Epic Games announces that Fortnite is back on the App Store in the US for iPhone and iPad users, and on the Epic Games Store and AltStore in the EU (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
Sweden passes a law criminalizing the purchase of live online sexual performances, including cam shows and sex chats; buying pre-recorded content remains legal (Charles Szumski/Euractiv)
